text: Luc Jean-Marie Robitaille (born February 17, 1966) is a Canadianâ€“American professional ice hockey executive and former player. He is the president of the Los Angeles Kings of the National Hockey League (NHL). He was born in Montreal, Quebec. He played for the Los Angeles Kings, Pittsburgh Penguins, New York Rangers and the Detroit Red Wings. He played from 1986 until 2006. Robitaille was honored into the Hockey Hall of Fame in 2009. ==References== Category:1966 births Category:Living people Category:Canadian ice hockey left wingers Category:Naturalized citizens of the United States Category:Los Angeles Kings players Category:Pittsburgh Penguins players Category:New York Rangers players Category:Detroit Red Wings players Category:Canadian businesspeople Category:Businesspeople from Los Angeles Category:Ice hockey people from Quebec Category:Sportspeople from Montreal
title: Luc Robitaille
